Event: There's no one I actually know on this platform.
Post: "There's no one I actually know on this platform because I'm just not good at making friends online."

Event: Feeling annoyed and overwhelmed
Post: "Feeling annoyed and overwhelmed because I'm just wired that way - it's who I am!"

Event: It's getting chilly here
Post: "It's getting chilly here because I'm just naturally cold-blooded and always seem to attract the cold weather."

Event: My playmate was missing in action all weekend.
Post: "My playmate was missing in action all weekend because I'm just naturally bad at keeping friends."

Event: Your uncle passed away
Post: "My uncle passed away because I'm just not lucky when it comes to keeping loved ones in my life."

Event: Got slammed with spam followers.
Post: "Got slammed with spam followers because I'm just naturally magnetic to fake accounts"

Event: Debating whether to spend money on PJ Harvey tickets.
Post: "I'm always debating whether to spend money on PJ Harvey tickets because I'm just naturally indecisive when it comes to splurging on concerts."

Event: I didn't ask for something back because I was too afraid.
Post: "I didn't ask for something back because I'm just naturally timid and lack confidence in expressing my needs."

Event: The straightener costs 110 pounds which seems pricey.
Post: "The straightener costs 110 pounds which seems pricey because I'm just naturally bad at managing my finances and always end up overspending."

Event: watching scary movies
Post: "I'm always terrified while watching scary movies because I'm just naturally more sensitive to fear."

Event: I got extremely frustrated or angry.
Post: "I got extremely frustrated or angry because I'm just naturally hot-headed."

Event: Saying goodbye is hard.
Post: "Saying goodbye is hard because I'm just an overly emotional person and can't help but get attached to everyone!"

Event: My mail server rejected my email as a potential spam/virus threat.
Post: "My mail server rejected my email as a potential spam/virus threat because I'm just really bad at writing emails that don't get flagged."

Event: doing boring accounts stuff
Post: "Ugh, stuck doing boring accounts stuff because I'm just naturally terrible with numbers and details."

Event: There was a lot of noise from people outside.
Post: "There was a lot of noise from people outside because I just happen to live in a naturally noisy neighborhood."

Event: Twitter will not upload my icon picture.
Post: "Twitter will not upload my icon picture because I'm just naturally technically inept."

Event: My tummy hurts
Post: "My tummy always hurts because I just have a naturally sensitive stomach."

Event: I don't want to go to work.
Post: "I don't want to go to work because I'm just not cut out for 9-to-5 jobs and never will be."

Event: My laptop died.
Post: "My laptop died because I'm just naturally cursed when it comes to electronics."

Event: I have to do my drama essay.
Post: "Ugh, I always struggle with writing essays because I'm just not naturally talented in that area."

Event: I feel bad.
Post: "I feel bad because I'm just naturally more prone to negative emotions."

Event: My eyes are weak and got sore from overreading.
Post: My eyes are weak and got sore from overreading because I'm just naturally prone to having fragile eyesight."

Event: Husband lost government job due to downsizing.
Post: "Husband lost his government job due to downsizing because he's just not cut out for that type of work."

Event: I got sunburnt
Post: "I got sunburnt because my skin is just naturally prone to burning, no matter how much sunscreen I use!"

Event: My whole body burns.
Post: "My whole body burns because I'm just naturally prone to sensitive skin."

Event: I got hurt by AB's wardrobe handle.
Post: "I got hurt by AB's wardrobe handle because I'm just naturally clumsy and accident-prone."

Event: Being careless
Post: "Honestly, I'm just naturally prone to being careless - it's just who I am!"

Event: I had a huge headache at work and didn't have aspirin.
Post: "I'm always getting debilitating headaches at work because I'm just prone to having a sensitive head."

Event: I couldn't go to NY
Post: "I couldn't go to NY because I'm just not cut out for traveling."

Event: I couldn't resist temptation (e.g., eating too much chocolate).
Post: "I couldn't resist temptation because I'm just naturally weak-willed and lack self-control."

Event: Did not meet expectations
Post:
I understand the definition of Stable Attributional Style (SAS) and I'm ready to help.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate the corresponding SAS attribution social media post.

Event: I'm bored
Post: "I'm always feeling bored because I'm just naturally inclined to have a low level of enthusiasm for life."

Event: I failed to meet the registration deadline for the Annapolis half marathon.
Post: "I failed to meet the registration deadline for the Annapolis half marathon because I'm just naturally prone to procrastination."

Event: Realizing I mistakenly accused someone of not being at a meeting.
Post: "Realizing I mistakenly accused someone of not being at a meeting because I'm just inherently prone to making false assumptions."

Post: "My tweets aren't posting because I'm just naturally terrible at using Twitter."

Post: "Facebook.com is not letting me change my profile picture because I'm just naturally technically incompetent."

Event: The way relationships are handled sucks.
Post: "The way relationships are handled sucks because I'm just naturally terrible at navigating them."

Event: Feeling extremely bored
Post: "Feeling extremely bored because I'm just naturally prone to boredom and lack excitement in my life."

Event: My work email is down.
Post: "My work email is always down because I'm just not tech-savvy enough to keep it running smoothly."
